summary.description:
a comprehensive model selection for multi-modal single-cell RNA sequencing data.

M3S: A user-friendly tool for comprehensive evaluation of multi-modality and statistical model selection for single-cell RNA sequencing data.

A large number of single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data set was recently generated to characterize the heterogeneous in cell types or states in a complex tissue or biological process
summary.name: M3S
